name: Longevity Network State Meetup
description:
You are invited to a Meetup to discuss actionable next steps around launching a Longevity Network State.

Come and join us to discuss the following topics!

  • Geographical Location Priorities -> visa, weather, medical freedom, cost of living, language...
  • Community Development -> which communities can we tap into, activate, merge with? 
  • Fundraising -> Real Estate, Venture
  • ... and more!

Healthy finger foods & beverages will be provided > additional finger-food contributions are most welcome :). 

Location Access
